Next item on the list is DAME AREA from the terrific Màgia Roja collective, who’ll play Claws Of Saurtopia on June 2. This Catalonian duo delivers some absolutely smashing ecstatic, hypnotic, sprawling industrial and minimal synth tracks—"inspired by Coil, Suicide, Franco Battiato, Gary Numan and Dino Buzzati” (as their promo text has it).

May 5th, 2018 9:03am Claws Of Saurtopia Màgia Roja Dame Area noise Leipzig
